titleStmt.title: The Presbyterian sham, or, A commentary upon the new old answer of the Assembly of divines to Dr. Stillingfleet's sermon
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Sir Roger L'Estrange in Wing and tentatively to him in Edinburgh Univ. Lib. Cat., v. 2, p. 189.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
